title: Fireside with the Underboss - "He's Gonna Kill This Guy Mark My Words"
description: Sammy and Peanuts read and talk about the Carmine Galante hit. Sammy answers a common question about the Canadian mafia.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: Sammy and Peanuts read and talk about the Carmine Galante hit. Sammy answers a common question about the Canadian mafia.
